official-title.#text: To prohibit the Central Intelligence Agency from using an unmanned aerial vehicle to carry out a weapons strike or other deliberately lethal action and to transfer the authority to conduct such strikes or lethal action to the Department of Defense.

header.#text: Prohibition on Central Intelligence Agency operation of unmanned aerial vehicle strikes and transfer of authority to the Department of Defense

text.#text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, no officer or employee of, or contractor or detailee to, the

text.#text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, the
